## Education

```{r}
#| output: asis
educ <- read.csv("data/education.csv",
                 colClasses = c("character", "Date", "Date", "character", "character"))

educ |>
  format_date(end = "end", sort_by = "start") |>
  resume_entry(title = "degree",
               description = "institution")
```
